verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the collection <S%G3048><s%> for the saints, <S%G40><s%> as I directed <S%G1299><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you also. <S%G2532><s%>

On the first <S%G1520><s%> day of every <S%G2596><s%> week <S%G4521><s%> let each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> of you put <S%G5087><s%> aside <S%G3844><s%> <S%G1438><s%> and save, <S%G2343><s%> as he may prosper, <S%G2137><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> collections <S%G3048><s%> be made <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> I arrive, <S%G3854><s%> whomever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you may approve, <S%G1381><s%> I shall send <S%G3992><s%> them with letters <S%G1992><s%> to carry <S%G667><s%> your gift <S%G5485><s%> to Jerusalem; <S%G2419><s%>
and if <S%G1437><s%> it is fitting <S%G514><s%> for me to go <S%G4198><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> they will go <S%G4198><s%> with me.
But I shall come <S%G2064><s%> to you after <S%G3752><s%> I go <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> for I am going <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia; <S%G3109><s%>

and perhaps <S%G5177><s%> I shall stay <S%G2650><s%> with you, or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> spend <S%G3914><s%> the winter, <S%G3914><s%> that you may send <S%G4311><s%> me on my way <S%G4311><s%> wherever <S%G3757><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I may go. <S%G4198><s%>

For I do not wish <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> you now <S%G737><s%> [just] in passing; <S%G3938><s%> for I hope <S%G1679><s%> to remain <S%G1961><s%> with you for some <S%G5100><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> permits. <S%G2010><s%>
But I shall remain <S%G1961><s%> in Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> Pentecost; <S%G4005><s%>
for a wide <S%G3173><s%> door <S%G2374><s%> for effective <S%G1756><s%> [service] has opened <S%G455><s%> to me, and there are many <S%G4183><s%> adversaries. <S%G480><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> see <S%G991><s%> that he is with you without <S%G870><s%> cause <S%G870><s%> to be afraid; <S%G870><s%> for he is doing <S%G2038><s%> the Lord's work, <S%G2041><s%> as I also <S%G2532><s%> am.

Let no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> him. But send <S%G4311><s%> him on his way <S%G4311><s%> in peace, <S%G1515><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that he may come <S%G2064><s%> to me; for I expect <S%G1551><s%> him with the brethren. <S%G80><s%>

But concerning <S%G4012><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%> I encouraged <S%G3870><s%> him greatly <S%G4183><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you with the brethren; <S%G80><s%> and it was not at all <S%G3843><s%> [his] desire <S%G2307><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> but he will come <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he has opportunity. <S%G2119><s%>
Be on the alert, <S%G1127><s%> stand <S%G4739><s%> firm <S%G4739><s%> in the faith, <S%G4102><s%> act <S%G407><s%> like <S%G407><s%> men, <S%G407><s%> be strong. <S%G2901><s%>
Let all <S%G3956><s%> that you do be done <S%G1096><s%> in love. <S%G26><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I urge <S%G3870><s%> you, brethren <S%G80><s%> (you know <S%G3609><s%> the household <S%G3614><s%> of Stephanas, <S%G4734><s%> that they were the first <S%G536><s%> fruits <S%G536><s%> of Achaia, <S%G882><s%> and that they have devoted <S%G5021><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> for ministry <S%G1248><s%> to the saints <S%G40><s%>),

that you also <S%G2532><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> men <S%G5108><s%> and to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who helps <S%G4903><s%> in the work <S%G4903><s%> and labors. <S%G2872><s%>

And I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of Stephanas <S%G4734><s%> and Fortunatus <S%G5415><s%> and Achaicus; <S%G883><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have supplied <S%G378><s%> what <S%G5303><s%> was lacking <S%G5303><s%> on your part.
For they have refreshed <S%G373><s%> my spirit <S%G4151><s%> and yours. <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> men. <S%G5108><s%>

The churches <S%G1577><s%> of Asia <S%G773><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. Aquila <S%G207><s%> and Prisca <S%G4251><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you heartily <S%G4183><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> with the church <S%G1577><s%> that is in their house. <S%G3624><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. Greet <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%>
The greeting <S%G783><s%> is in my own <S%G1699><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> â€“ Paul. <S%G3972><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> does not love <S%G5368><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> let him be accursed. <S%G331><s%> Maranatha. <S%G3134><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> be with you.
My love <S%G26><s%> be with you all <S%G3956><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
